headline: Does Hershey’s Olympic Medals Push Reveal a Deeper Brand Strategy Shift for HSY Investors?
summary: Hershey has launched a new creative platform, “Hershey’s. It’s Your Happy Place.,” built around the Olympic and Paralympic Winter Games Milano Cortina 2026, featuring five Team USA athletes and limited-edition gold-foil chocolate medals with promotional giveaways and commercial releases while supplies last. By tying emotional storytelling about “happiness beyond the podium” to collectible chocolate medals, Hershey is turning a global sports moment into a branded keepsake experience for...

headline: Jim Cramer on Ares Capital: “I Want to Be Very Careful There”
summary: Ares Capital Corporation (NASDAQ:ARCC) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. When a caller mentioned that their top five holdings are AAPL, ARCC, HSY, KMB, and NVDA, Cramer remarked: Wow, okay. Well, you got some yield there. You got some growth. I don’t like the Ares because I can’t really tell what […]
